title: 4K monitor support
body:
Hello, right now your game doesn't support the new screen i got for my b.day!!!

I'm a main rengar, so its not enough that you butcher my fav champ your game cant even run 4k, while most of the new games from big companies can run their games on 4k, especially heavy multiplayer games.

The only way I got the game to work now is by playing on 1080 res on full screen, which I don't wanna do since I'm streaming and reacting with my stream chat while playing(alt tabbing when got nothing to do) using full screen makes the mouse be tiny which makes me alt + enter few times to fix, which makes me play worse.

Also, how can I change the client's default resolution? It always starts extremely small, and since I stream I have to change it to the exact same resolution I did the time before that or else I'd have to twick it on the streaming program again, every time I quit the client it resets to the small default resolution which is extremely small in 4k monitors, so small that the text is unreadable.

Fix it or give me a workaround

replies.body: Happy birthday on your new screen!  I know it may suck to hear right now, but 4k is not currently supported with League.  You'll need to reduce your resolution as a workaround for now.  This can be done in-game via the Video options and selecting your resolution.  You may also need to change your screen's resolution as well.  I hope that helps, and despite this news, I hope you had a great birthday!
why not just support 4k resolution like dota?
